alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 20 at 2:51PM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Make frequent checks on older family, friends, and neighbors. Ensure portable heaters are used correctly. Do not use generators or grills inside. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County
